inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: 1.8 cm infiltrating ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no suspicious axillary or internal mammary nodes on MRI or ultrasound, but no cT1-2N0 information provided

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: undergo neoadjuvant chemotherapy with a trastuzumab based regimen prior to surgery

inclusion.criterion: Lumpectomy and Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients are required to undergo lumpectomy with sentinel lymph node biopsy

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: no evidence of residual disease in the tumor bed, but no information on fibrotic area or treatment related change in lymph nodes

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: fibrotic area located at least 3 mm away from surgical margins, but no information on tumor bed size

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no previously diagnosed malignancy excluding basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: CXR was unremarkable, but no information on metastatic disease

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with invasive ductal carcinoma and HER2-positive status. She has undergone neoadjuvant chemotherapy with trastuzumab and plans for completion of one year of trastuzumab.
